description: Get dinner on the table in just four steps with this easy tuna pasta bake recipe. Itâ€™s a one-pan dinner the whole family will love.
keywords: Pasta bake,Low saturated fat,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Fish,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Easy Tuna Pasta Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g pasta bake with three cheese sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200oC. Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain and return to pan.
Drain tuna and flake into large pieces. Add to pasta, along with spinach and three-quarters of the sauce. Season, then stir to combine.
Spoon pasta mixture into a greased 1.5 litre-capacity baking dish. Drizzle over remaining sauce. Season.
Bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve.
